name: casaba
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of melon (= a large fruit with a thick skin) that has yellow skin and sweet white or yellow flesh: All ripe melons should have a nice floral smell, except for casabas, which have no aroma. Stalls line the roadside stacked with casaba, the area's main product.
More examplesFewer examplesHe knew where he could get off the train and pick up ripe casaba melons.Winter varieties include honeydew, casaba, and the aptly named Christmas melon.
